text:
[Web발신]
(광고) IBK기업은행 「2024 IBK 외환 올림Pick 시즌2」 이벤트 안내
안녕하세요, 고객님!
IBK기업은행이 외환 신규기업 대상 「2024 IBK 외환 올림Pick 시즌2」를 개최합니다!
이 문자를 받으신 고객님은 「2024 IBK 외환 올림Pick 시즌2」 이벤트 대상입니다!
간단하게 링크 접속해서 응모하고, 풍성한 혜택 받아가세요!
▷ 기간 : '24. 9. 5.( 목) ~ 11. 30.( 토)
▷ 대상 : '23년 IBK기업은행에서 수출입 거래 USD 10만불 미만 기업
▷ 이벤트 내용
① 이벤트 기간 내 선택한 목표를 달성한 기업 중 ’24.7월~11월 기준 수출입 실적 상위 기업에게 환율우대 및 외환수수료 감면 혜택 제공
- 금메달 : 환율우대 80%, 외환수수료 감면 50%, 총 100개 기업
- 은메달 : 환율우대 70%, 외환수수료 감면 40%, 총 100개 기업
- 동메달 : 환율우대 60%, 외환수수료 감면 30%, 총 300개 기업
② 이벤트 기간 내 선택한 목표를 달성한 기업 중 추첨을 통해 경품 제공
- 금메달 : 삼성 갤럭시탭 S9 FE 128G 15개
- 은메달 : 삼성 스마트모니터 및 무빙 스탠드 20개
- 동메달 : 삼성 갤럭시 워치7 44mm 30개
▷ 응모방법 : 이벤트 페이지에서 수출입 거래 목표를 선택하여 응모
trans:
[Sent from the web]
(Advertisement) IBK Industrial Bank of Korea: 「2024 IBK Foreign Exchange OlymPick Season 2」 Event Information
Hello, customer!
IBK Industrial Bank of Korea is hosting the 「2024 IBK Foreign Exchange OlymPick Season 2」 event for new foreign exchange companies!
As a recipient of this message, you are eligible to participate in the 「2024 IBK Foreign Exchange OlymPick Season 2」 event.
Simply click the link to apply and take advantage of these offers!
▷ Period : September 5 (Thursday) – November 30, 2024 (Saturday)
▷ Eligibility : Companies with import/export transactions of less than USD 100,000 at IBK Industrial Bank of Korea in 2023
▷ Event Details
① Companies that achieve their selected goals during the event period will receive preferential exchange rates and reduced foreign exchange fees, based on top export and import performance from July to November 2024
- Gold Medal : 80% preferential exchange rate, 50% foreign exchange fee reduction, 100 companies
- Silver Medal : 70% preferential exchange rate, 40% foreign exchange fee reduction, 100 companies
- Bronze Medal : 60% preferential exchange rate, 30% foreign exchange fee reduction, 300 companies
② Prizes will be awarded through a drawing among companies that achieve their selected goals during the event period
- Gold Medal : 15 Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE 128GB
- Silver Medal : 20 Samsung Smart Monitors with moving stands
- Bronze Medal : 30 Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 44mm
▷ How to Apply: Select your export/import transaction goal on the event page and submit your application
